directions: In a slow cooker, mix the broth, button mushrooms, shiitake mushrooms, barley, lentils, onion flakes, garlic, savory, bay leaves, basil, pepper, and salt.
Cover, and cook 4 to 6 hours on High or 10 to 12 hours on Low. Remove bay leaves before serving.
ingredients: 1 ounce dried shiitake mushrooms, torn into pieces
title: Mushroom Lentil Barley Stew
